text.ascii: lomaza uvAca
text.ur: lomaśa uvāca

text.ascii: nRgeNa yajamAnena someneha puraMdaraH
text.ur: nr̥geṇa yajamānena someneha puraṁdaraḥ

text.ascii: tarpitaH zrUyate rAjan sa tRpto madam abhyagAt
text.ur: tarpitaḥ śrūyate rājan sa tr̥pto madam abhyagāt

text.ascii: iha devaiH sahendrair hi prajApatibhir eva ca
text.ur: iha devaiḥ sahendrair hi prajāpatibhir eva ca

text.ascii: iSTaM bahuvidhair yajJair mahadbhir bhUridakSiNaiH
text.ur: iṣṭaṁ bahuvidhair yajñair mahadbhir bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ

text.ascii: AmUrtarayasaz ceha rAjA vajradharaM prabhum
text.ur: āmūrtarayasaś ceha rājā vajradharaṁ prabhum

text.ascii: tarpayAm Asa somena hayamedheSu saptasu
text.ur: tarpayām āsa somena hayamedheṣu saptasu

text.ascii: tasya saptasu yajJeSu sarvam AsId dhiraNmayam
text.ur: tasya saptasu yajñeṣu sarvam āsīd dhiraṇmayam

text.ascii: vAnaspatyaM ca bhaumaM ca yad dravyaM niyataM makhe
text.ud: वानस्पत्यं च भौमं च यद्द्रव्यं नियतं मखे
text.ur: vānaspatyaṁ ca bhaumaṁ ca yad dravyaṁ niyataṁ makhe

text.ascii: teSv eva cAsya yajJeSu prayogAH sapta vizrutAH
text.ud: तेष्वेव चास्य यज्ञेषु प्रयोगाः सप्त विश्रुताः
text.ur: teṣv eva cāsya yajñeṣu prayogāḥ sapta viśrutāḥ

text.ascii: saptaikaikasya yUpasya caSAlAz copari sthitAH
text.ur: saptaikaikasya yūpasya caṣālāś copari sthitāḥ

text.ascii: tasya sma yUpAn yajJeSu bhrAjamAnAn hiraNmayAn
text.ur: tasya sma yūpān yajñeṣu bhrājamānān hiraṇmayān

text.ascii: svayam utthApayAm Asur devAH sendrA yudhiSThira
text.ur: svayam utthāpayām āsur devāḥ sendrā yudhiṣṭhira

text.ascii: teSu tasya makhAgryeSu gayasya pRthivIpateH
text.ur: teṣu tasya makhāgryeṣu gayasya pr̥thivīpateḥ

text.ascii: amAdyad indraH somena dakSiNAbhir dvijAtayaH
text.ur: amādyad indraḥ somena dakṣiṇābhir dvijātayaḥ

text.ascii: sikatA vA yathA loke yathA vA divi tArakAH
text.ud: सिकता वा यथा लोके यथा वा दिवि तारकाः
text.ur: sikatā vā yathā loke yathā vā divi tārakāḥ

text.ascii: yathA vA varSato dhArA asaMkhyeyAz ca kena cit
text.ud: यथा वा वर्षतो धारा असंख्येयाश्च केनचित्
text.ur: yathā vā varṣato dhārā asaṁkhyeyāś ca kena cit

text.ascii: tathaiva tad asaMkhyeyaM dhanaM yat pradadau gayaH
text.ur: tathaiva tad asaṁkhyeyaṁ dhanaṁ yat pradadau gayaḥ

text.ascii: sadasyebhyo mahArAja teSu yajJeSu saptasu
text.ur: sadasyebhyo mahārāja teṣu yajñeṣu saptasu

text.ascii: bhavet saMkhyeyam etad vai yad etat parikIrtitam
text.ur: bhavet saṁkhyeyam etad vai yad etat parikīrtitam

text.ascii: na sA zakyA tu saMkhyAtuM dakSiNA dakSiNAvataH
text.ud: न सा शक्या तु संख्यातुं दक्षिणा दक्षिणावतः
text.ur: na sā śakyā tu saṁkhyātuṁ dakṣiṇā dakṣiṇāvataḥ

text.ascii: hiraNmayIbhir gobhiz ca kRtAbhir vizvakarmaNA
text.ur: hiraṇmayībhir gobhiś ca kr̥tābhir viśvakarmaṇā

text.ascii: brAhmaNAMs tarpayAm Asa nAnAdigbhyaH samAgatAn
text.ur: brāhmaṇāṁs tarpayām āsa nānādigbhyaḥ samāgatān

text.ascii: alpAvazeSA pRthivI caityair AsIn mahAtmanaH
text.ur: alpāvaśeṣā pr̥thivī caityair āsīn mahātmanaḥ

text.ascii: gayasya yajamAnasya tatra tatra vizAM pate
text.ud: गयस्य यजमानस्य तत्र तत्र विशां पते
text.ur: gayasya yajamānasya tatra tatra viśāṁ pate

text.ascii: sa lokAn prAptavAn aindrAn karmaNA tena bhArata
text.ur: sa lokān prāptavān aindrān karmaṇā tena bhārata

text.ascii: salokatAM tasya gacchet payoSNyAM ya upaspRzet
text.ur: salokatāṁ tasya gacchet payoṣṇyāṁ ya upaspr̥śet

text.ascii: tasmAt tvam atra rAjendra bhrAtRbhiH sahito 'nagha
text.ur: tasmāt tvam atra rājendra bhrātr̥bhiḥ sahito ’nagha

text.ascii: upaspRzya mahIpAla dhUtapApmA bhaviSyasi
text.ur: upaspr̥śya mahīpāla dhūtapāpmā bhaviṣyasi

text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: sa payoSNyAM narazreSThaH snAtvA vai bhrAtRbhiH saha
text.ud: स पयोष्ण्यां नरश्रेष्ठः स्नात्वा वै भ्रातृभिः सह
text.ur: sa payoṣṇyāṁ naraśreṣṭhaḥ snātvā vai bhrātr̥bhiḥ saha

text.ascii: vaiDUryaparvataM caiva narmadAM ca mahAnadIm
text.ur: vaiḍūryaparvataṁ caiva narmadāṁ ca mahānadīm

text.ascii: samAjagAma tejasvI bhrAtRbhiH sahito 'naghaH
text.ur: samājagāma tejasvī bhrātr̥bhiḥ sahito ’naghaḥ

text.ascii: tato 'sya sarvANy Acakhyau lomazo bhagavAn RSiH
text.ur: tato ’sya sarvāṇy ācakhyau lomaśo bhagavān r̥ṣiḥ

text.ascii: tIrthAni ramaNIyAni tatra tatra vizAM pate
text.ud: तीर्थानि रमणीयानि तत्र तत्र विशां पते
text.ur: tīrthāni ramaṇīyāni tatra tatra viśāṁ pate

text.ascii: yathAyogaM yathAprIti prayayau bhrAtRbhiH saha
text.ur: yathāyogaṁ yathāprīti prayayau bhrātr̥bhiḥ saha

text.ascii: dadamAno 'sakRd vittaM brAhmaNebhyaH sahasrazaH
text.ur: dadamāno ’sakr̥d vittaṁ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ sahasraśaḥ

text.ascii: lomaza uvAca
text.ur: lomaśa uvāca

text.ascii: devAnAm eti kaunteya tathA rAjJAM salokatAm
text.ur: devānām eti kaunteya tathā rājñāṁ salokatām

text.ascii: vaiDUryaparvataM dRSTvA narmadAm avatIrya ca
text.ur: vaiḍūryaparvataṁ dr̥ṣṭvā narmadām avatīrya ca

text.ascii: saMdhir eSa narazreSTha tretAyA dvAparasya ca
text.ur: saṁdhir eṣa naraśreṣṭha tretāyā dvāparasya ca

text.ascii: etam AsAdya kaunteya sarvapApaiH pramucyate
text.ur: etam āsādya kaunteya sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate

text.ascii: eSa zaryAtiyajJasya dezas tAta prakAzate
text.ur: eṣa śaryātiyajñasya deśas tāta prakāśate

text.ascii: sAkSAd yatrApibat somam azvibhyAM saha kauzikaH
text.ur: sākṣād yatrāpibat somam aśvibhyāṁ saha kauśikaḥ

text.ascii: cukopa bhArgavaz cApi mahendrasya mahAtapAH
text.ur: cukopa bhārgavaś cāpi mahendrasya mahātapāḥ

text.ascii: saMstambhayAm Asa ca taM vAsavaM cyavanaH prabhuH
text.ud: संस्तम्भयामास च तं वासवं च्यवनः प्रभुः
text.ur: saṁstambhayām āsa ca taṁ vāsavaṁ cyavanaḥ prabhuḥ

text.ascii: sukanyAM cApi bhAryAM sa rAjaputrIm ivAptavAn
text.ur: sukanyāṁ cāpi bhāryāṁ sa rājaputrīm ivāptavān

text.ascii: yudhiSThira uvAca
text.ur: yudhiṣṭhira uvāca

text.ascii: kathaM viSTambhitas tena bhagavAn pAkazAsanaH
text.ur: kathaṁ viṣṭambhitas tena bhagavān pākaśāsanaḥ

text.ascii: kimarthaM bhArgavaz cApi kopaM cakre mahAtapAH
text.ur: kimarthaṁ bhārgavaś cāpi kopaṁ cakre mahātapāḥ

text.ascii: nAsatyau ca kathaM brahman kRtavAn somapIthinau
text.ur: nāsatyau ca kathaṁ brahman kr̥tavān somapīthinau

text.ascii: etat sarvaM yathAvRttam AkhyAtu bhagavAn mama
text.ur: etat sarvaṁ yathāvr̥ttam ākhyātu bhagavān mama
